TopicTitle: Will there be a record or something similar of the Hangout today?

Articles.Content: I wont be able to join the recently anounced Hangout today. Will there be a record of it posted on Youtube or a official summary? I dont want to rely on memorys of someone (no offense), i just want every detail of the Hangout...
I think Hangouts automatically become visible in Youtube, but I could be wrong. At least the system used to be integrated with YT.

I dont want to rely on memorys of someone (no offense)

None taken!

Although, the grammar national socialist (sorry, forum turns short version into asterisks) within me seems to have gone mad with the way you spell "memories".
